name: PyTorch
description: slow; usage ok but complex (a lot options); good documentation; good community

name: ONNX
description: fast on CPU (3x); usage ok; good documentation

name: Ultralytics
description: easy to use; high level of abstraction; good documentation; large community

name: TensorFlow(lite)
description: usage ok; lite modelle fast with int types; good documentation

name: Hailo
description: usage ok; model needs to be converted to special format (.hef); convertion not trivial
